00017 #ifndef _FRED_VACCINEDOSE_H
00018 #define _FRED_VACCINEDOSE_H
00019 
00020 #include "Global.h"
00021 #include "Age_Map.h"
00022 
00023 class Vaccine_Dose {
00024   // Vaccine_Dose is a class to hold the efficacy and dosing information 
00025   // for a vaccine.  A vaccine may have as many doses as it needs.
00026 public:
00027   // Creation Operators
00028   Vaccine_Dose(Age_Map* _efficacy, Age_Map* _efficacy_delay, int _days_between_doses);
00029   ~Vaccine_Dose();
00030   
00031   //Parameter Access
00032   Age_Map* get_efficacy_map()       const { return efficacy;}
00033   Age_Map* get_efficacy_delay_map() const { return efficacy_delay;}
00034   
00035   double  get_efficacy(int age)         const { return efficacy->find_value(age);  }
00036   double  get_efficacy_delay(int age)   const { return efficacy_delay->find_value(age); }
00037   int     get_days_between_doses()  const { return days_between_doses; }
00038   
00039   bool    is_within_age(int age) const;
00040   
00041   //Utility Functions... no need for update or reset.
00042   void print() const;
00043   
00044 private:
00045   int days_between_doses;       // Number of days until the next dose is administered
00046   Age_Map* efficacy;            // Age specific efficacy of vaccine, does the dose provide immunity
00047   Age_Map* efficacy_delay;      // Age specific delay to efficacy, how long does it take to develop immunity
00048   
00049 protected:
00050   Vaccine_Dose() { }
00051 };
00052 
00053 #endif
